_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation file for the map DE_ZIBA

Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: October 14 2017

Here is the Navigation Mesh for amazing fast-paced corridors-themed map de_ziba by KENNITHH & Valerik (relesed September 2017). It's fully created from scratch and carefully hand-tuned (manually optimized) .nav-file because original mapauthor's nav-file was not perfect.

More than a half of all auto-generated areas were remade manually. The special attention was paid to all numerous windows, doors and stairways.

Well... bots use all possible ways now and perfectly navigate with all map. They are very inspired with the idea about destruction of a private property :-)

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted (more detailed and more suitable to environment than in original).

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original navigation file by map creator available to downloading with the same map.

Play and Enjoy! Also your responses for me are still important ;-)

Credits and Gratitudes: KENNITHH & Valerik (for nice remake of nice map from Battlefield 3)

Additional Gratitudes: BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes), CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

There's a ghost outside my window haunting me :D
